hcaptcha-edit: To protect the wiki against automated edit spam, we kindly ask you to solve the following hCaptcha:
hcaptcha-addurl: Your edit includes new external links. To protect the wiki against automated spam, we kindly ask you to solve the following hCaptcha:
hcaptcha-badlogin: To protect the wiki against automated password cracking, we kindly ask you to solve the following hCaptcha:
hcaptcha-createaccount: To protect the wiki against automated account creation, we kindly ask you to solve the following hCaptcha:
hcaptcha-createaccount-fail: It seems you haven't solved the hCaptcha.
hcaptcha-create: To protect the wiki against automated page creation, we kindly ask you to solve the following hCaptcha:
hcaptcha-help: Please solve a hCaptcha challenge and return the response value as captchaWord.
hcaptcha-privacy-policy: This site is protected by hCaptcha and its [https://www.hcaptcha.com/privacy Privacy Policy] and [https://www.hcaptcha.com/terms Terms of Service] apply.
hcaptcha-challenge-closed: Please solve the challenge before submitting the form.
hcaptcha-challenge-expired: The time limit to solve the challenge has expired. Please try again.
hcaptcha-load-error: There was an error while loading hCaptcha. Please check your network connection, then reload the page.
hcaptcha-rate-limited: hCaptcha rate limit exceeded. Please reload the page and try again.
hcaptcha-unknown-error: An unknown error occurred while executing the hCaptcha challenge. Please reload the page and try again.
hcaptcha-loading-indicator-label: Please wait while hCaptcha spam protection is initializing
